title: How to find the best new rappers - Quora

response.answer_text: You can find new rappers on Spotify, Soundcloud, Youtube. To find the best rappers you can check out my blog where I suggest new and emerging rappers: http://groovedetector.com
are you looking for someone exceptional you can see fantom new di yo sa. i mean amazing . i heard it first time yesterday and now i am a big fan you should too, he is growing star.
